content:
Bilram

Bilram is a town and a nagar panchayat in Kashiram Nagar (Kasganj)   in the state of Uttar Pradesh, India.

Demographics
As of the 2001 Census of India,{"citetype": "web", "url": "http://www.censusindia.net/results/town.php?stad=A&state5=999", "title": "Census of India 2001: Data from the 2001 Census, including cities, villages and towns  (Provisional)", "accessdate": "2008-11-01", "archiveurl": "https://web.archive.org/web/20040616075334/http://www.censusindia.net/results/town.php?stad=A&state5=999", "archivedate": "2004-06-16"}Bilram is a town and a nagar panchayat in Kasganj districtj in the state of Uttar Pradesh, India. Bilram had a population of 12,119. Males constitute 54% of the population and females 46%. Bilram has an average literacy rate of 29%, lower than the national average of 59.5%; with male literacy of 37% and female literacy of 20%. 18% of the population is under 6 years of age.
